column4: yo people, i got one assignment and i don't know exacty how to solve it, i searched on google, but its to dificult for me

i need to Write a script. The script should display the path to your homedirectory and the terminal type that you are using. Additionally it shows all the services started up in runlevel 3 on your system. (hint: use HOME, TERM and ls /etc/rc3.d/S*)
i started on the script but i dont know how to show what terminal type i am using
if your teacher wanted US to do your homework, he'd asked us directly :)
